濐字的基本解释

濐
zhǔ
古同“渚”。

濐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǔ］
［《廣韻》章與切，上語，章。］
亦作“濐1”。亦作“陼1”。
(1)小洲；水中的小块陆地。
(2)指居住渚上。
(3)水边。
(4)岛。
(5)通“瀦”。蓄水处。指陂塘之类。

濐字的康熙字典解释

【補遺】【巳集】【水字部】　濐； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页655第20
【字彙補】之暑切，音主。水涯也。

濐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
濐字的起名意思

暂无。

Squeeze
Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
zhǔ
Gu Tong "Zhu".
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [zhǔ]
["Guangyun" chapter and cut, first language, chapter. ]
Also known as "Zip 1". Also known as "Hui 1".
(1) Xiaozhou; a small piece of land in the water.
(2) Refers to living in Zhushang.
(3) Waterside.
(4) Island.
(5) Through "Zhu". Water storage place. Refers to Pitang and the like.
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Addendum] [Si Collection] [Water Word Department] 　濐; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 655 No. 20
【Word Supplement】Zhi Shuqie, the main sound. Shui Ya also.
